type.description: The type of the engine. Must be "sldb".

avoidNodebug.description: Avoid functions with no debug info.

avoidStdFunctions.description: Avoid functions from the C++ Standard library

stepThroughStdFunctions.description: Step through C++ Standard library functional objects code when performing step into.

markStdFunctions.description: Mark C++ Standard library functional objects frames as subtle.

avoidRegexList.description: List of regular expressions to match functions to avoid.

stepThroughRegexList.description: List of regular expressions to match functions to step through when performing step into.

markRegexList.description: List of regular expressions to match functions to be marked as subtle in call stack.

environment.description: Environment variables in form of array of {"name": "", "value": ""} objects

platformUrl.description: URL of platform to connect. For most platforms, URL contains host name and port number in the form of <host-name>:<port>. For the android platform, URL is a device name. If URL is empty for the android platform then default device is used.

execSearchPaths.description: List of local paths to search for loaded executables and shared libraries.

androidSdk.description: Path to Android SDK for the android platform.

androidNdk.description: Path to Android NDK for the android platform.

androidJdb.description: Optional path to JDB to use with the android platform.

debugServerExecutable.description: Path to Debug Adapter Protocol server executabe. Used for debugging sldb.

logLevel.description: Logging level for Debug Adapter Protocol server executabe. Used for debugging sldb.

type.description: The type of the engine. Must be "sldb".

pid.description: ID of process to attach to.

program.description: Name of process to attach to.

androidNdk.description: Path to Android NDK for the android platform.
